V

validateTopicAndMessage(String, String, OutputStream) - Method in class servlets.TopicValidator
 
value1 - Variable in class configs.DecAgent
The DecAgent class implements the Agent interface and calculates the decrement of one value received from subscribed topic And publishes the result to the first output topic.
value1 - Variable in class configs.DivAgent
The DivAgent class implements the Agent interface and calculates the division of two values received from subscribed topics
value1 - Variable in class configs.IncAgent
The IncAgent class implements the Agent interface and calculates the increment of one value received from subscribed topic And publishes the result to the first output topic.
value1 - Variable in class configs.MulAgent
The MulAgent class implements the Agent interface and calculates the multiplication of two values received from subscribed topics
value1 - Variable in class configs.PlusAgent
The PlusAgent class implements the Agent interface and calculates the sum of two values received from subscribed topics
value1 - Variable in class configs.SubAgent
The SubAgent class implements the Agent interface and calculates the substraction of two values received from subscribed topics
